# dna-code
encode any file into a DNA sequence

```bash
gcc main.c -o dna
./dna sample_data/message.txt
```
output:
```
encoding file: sample_data/message.txt
DNA Encoded string: 
ACCTTTCTAGCTAGCTGGCT
```

```
./dna sample_data/starrynight.jpg
```

output: 
```
encoding file: sample_data/starrynight.jpg
DNA Encoded string: 

```
